com.ucsf.core_phone.ui.widgets

Class CustomDialog.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ucsf.core_phone.ui.widgets.CustomDialog.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CustomDialog

    public static class CustomDialog.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for creating a custom dialog.

      • addFooterButton

        public CustomDialog.Builder addFooterButton(java.lang.String text,
                                            OnClickListener listener)
        Add a footer button using the given text and OnClickListener (which may be null). Remark that this button will dismiss the dialog.

      • addFooterButton

        public CustomDialog.Builder addFooterButton(int textId,
                                            OnClickListener listener)
        Add a footer button using the given text and OnClickListener (which may be null). Remark that this button will dismiss the dialog.
